FuncDef: The reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics command resets packet statistics in the RBS buffer in a dual-device hot backup scenario for virtual BAS users.
CLIs: reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics slot <slot-id>
reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics user-id <user-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics slot 1
<HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics user-id 566272
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a dual-device hot backup scenario for virtual BAS users, if packet statistics in the RBP buffer are not needed or overstocked, run the reset multicast remote-backup bas-no-host statistics command to reset the packets statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
